title: Sports Programs Supervisor (FWS Eligible) Student Worker II
keywords: set-up and take-down of sports sites and equipment
duties_responsibilities: Serve as an official/referee/umpire for intramural contests
Serve as a game monitor for non-officiated sports
Learn both the rules of the game and the mechanics necessary to enforce the rules
Exercise authority in an impartial, firm and controlled manner
Dress neatly and appropriately for each shift
Be punctual and professional in the fulfillment of their responsibilities
Supervise the set-up and take-down of sports sites and equipment, including but not limited to water, ice, first aid, and all other items for sports programs
Follow emergency care procedures in the event of an injury or emergency through implementation of CPR and First-Aid
Identify and report emergency situations quickly
Accept constructive criticism as a means to improvement
Diffuse conflict with participants, does not escalate conflict
Effectively communicate with Sports Programs Manager regarding participant and facility issues
Perform other duties as specified by the Program Manager, Student Coordinator, or Professional Staff
required_qualifications: Previous knowledge or skill and/or equivalent experience or training
Current ASU student enrolled in at least one credit hour
Attain and maintain all ASU SDFC training required: American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer/AED and Standard First Aid certifications (offered through Sun Devil Fitness once employed)
Ability to work in a teamwork-oriented environment
Must be observant, safety conscious and able to react calmly and quickly in case of an emergency
Ability to communicate effectively, possesses mature judgment and sound decision-making
Ability to motivate participants in the areas of wellbeing and teamwork
Ability to guide session activities that meet individual needs for each participant
Ability to effectively apply methods when constructive feedback is given
